column5: Beautifully fully furnished condo includes a spacious living room w/ fireplace, dining area, full granite kitchen and outdoor private patio. The master bedroom (King bed and Full bathroom and Private Patio); 2nd bedroom (Queen bed and full Bathroom adjacent, extra Folding Rollaway Guest Bed Cot with Mattress included.   Located on the 1st floor, all tile flooring.   Very Spacious, Sleeps 4-5.   Incredible Location!
column8: Condo at Rancho Viejo Golf Course
